submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList

class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        res = []
        sd = SortedList()
        diff = n - 1
        for a, b in queries:
            # print(a, b)
            i = sd.bisect_left((a, -inf))
            if 0 <= i - 1 < len(sd):
                pa, pb = sd[i - 1]
                if pa <= a and b <= pb:
                    res.append(diff)
                    print(sd)
                    continue  
            add = True
            # print(i, len(sd))
            while i < len(sd): 
                pa, pb = sd[i]
                if a <= pa and pb <= b:
                    sd.discard((pa, pb))
                    diff += pb - pa - 1
                elif pa <= a and b <= pb:
                    res.append(diff)
                    add = False
                    print(sd)
                    break   
                else:
                    break
            if add is True:
                sd.add((a, b))
                diff -= b - a - 1 
                res.append(diff)
                # print(sd)
        return res
